content: *from the designer * this square is the perfect size to join for a scarf or a baby afghan you can make a full size afghan if you like smaller squares *size * approximately 4-1/2 x 4-1/2 *materials * - bernat baby coordinates sport weight - white - bernat baby coordinates sport weight - contrasting color cc *stitches * chain single_crochet slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet *difficulty * medium
